mapper.select: select id, sum(fd.amount * price) sumPrice from fDetail fd, reward r where fd.rNum = r.rNum and r.fNum = #{fNum} group by id
select count(count(id)) from fDetail fd, reward r where fd.rNum = r.rNum and r.fNum = #{fNum} group by id

select e.fNum fNum, e.amount amount, e.camout camout, fdetail.fdNum fdNum from( select * from funding where sdate < (sysdate + (1/24)*9) and edate < (sysdate + (1/24)*9) and confirm = 'y' ) e, ( select * from fdetail where state = '예약' ) fdetail where e.fnum = fdetail.fnum
